img_above_text:
* Return to the Squall Hideout Shrine, and instead stick to the far right side of the open valley and up to some ruins. Fight your way to the top of the stairs and keep staff spinning to deflect the ranged attacks until all the Blazebones are dead. At the end of this high raised wooden platform you’ll find another of the giant statue heads, allowing you to take its Buddhas Eyeball.
* Located just across the crevice from the previous Buddha statue head, look for a pathway along a ridge left of the crevice to find a Buddha's Eyeball to claim here.
img_below_text:
* Between the Squall Hideout and Rockrest Flat Shrines, you can find a large cave and tunnel leading to the Mother of Stones Yaoguai Chief fight. Take a right when looking at the boss to find a cave exit onto a small raised platform, and you'll find a statue head here.
![Wukong Eye6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Eye6.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "* Return to the Squall Hideout Shrine, and instead stick to the far right side of the open valley and up to some ruins. Fight your way to the top of the stairs and keep staff spinning to deflect the ranged attacks until all the Blazebones are dead. At the end of this high raised wooden platform you’ll find another of the giant statue heads, allowing you to take its Buddhas Eyeball.
* Located just across the crevice from the previous Buddha statue head, look for a pathway along a ridge left of the crevice to find a Buddha's Eyeball to claim here."
            - Following Text: "* Between the Squall Hideout and Rockrest Flat Shrines, you can find a large cave and tunnel leading to the Mother of Stones Yaoguai Chief fight. Take a right when looking at the boss to find a cave exit onto a small raised platform, and you'll find a statue head here.

            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. The image shows two scenes from a video game. The left side depicts a character in combat with enemies in a grassy, rocky area. The right side shows a character standing on a path leading to a small raised platform with a red-circled object, likely a collectible item.

2. The image serves to illustrate key locations and actions in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The left side shows the player fighting enemies in an open valley, while the right side highlights a pathway to a Buddha's Eyeball collectible, located across a crevice and along a ridge.
